main event: An observer sighted a red and a white light attached to one object in Gallipolis, Ohio on May 22, 1960.
interesting points: The observed lights were about the size of stars and visible for approximately 6 minutes.,The conclusion of the report suggested the lights were probably an aircraft.,There was no evidence presented that the object was indeed an aircraft.,Only one object was reported despite the two lights.,The report comes from the historical Project Blue Book archives, which investigated UFO sightings.
sighted object: one object with red and white lights
witness description: The observer who reported the sighting.
